fixes.name: Delta Down USD 2Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T USD 2Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
